title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1160.21 - Ground transportation tariff

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1160.21 - Ground transportation tariff

State Regulations
BUSES, SCHEDULED AND UNSCHEDULED

Annual flat fee

Category

Option 2: Coupon Book

OFF-AIRPORT PARKING OPERATOR, CAR RENTAL
Percent of gross revenue generated from airport patrons
according to the following scale: Gross revenue

Access fee

First $500,000
4 percent
$500,001 - $1,000,000
6 percent
$1,000,001 - $1,500,000
8 percent

Any amount over $1,500,000
10 percent

Minimum monthly payment: 1/12 of fee imposed on previous year revenue

Actual revenue settlement: 14 days after year end

Gross revenue for off-airport parking
operations
shall mean all transactions made for cash, credit or
otherwise from parking fees collected at the site from airport patrons during
the period less any applicable sales taxes. Gross revenue for off-airport car rental
operations
shall mean the aggregate amount of all rental transactions
made for cash, credit or otherwise to airport patrons, including personal
accident and primary liability insurance, additional driver and youthful driver
charges, child restraint seats, ski and luggage racks, and cellular phones, less any applicable sales taxes. LIMOUSINE/VAN, HOTEL/MOTEL COURTESY

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
